scripts.build: mkdir -p static/js && yarn run build-js && yarn run build-css
scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path node_modules static/sass --output static/css && postcss --use autoprefixer --replace 'static/css/**/*.css' && postcss --use cssnano --dir static/minified 'static/css/**/*.css' && cp node_modules/@canonical/cookie-policy/build/css/cookie-policy.css static/css/cookie-policy.css
scripts.test: yarn run lint-scss && yarn run lint-python && yarn run test-python
scripts.lint-python: flake8 webapp tests && black --check --line-length 79 webapp tests
